sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-data-binding', templateUrl: './data-binding.component.html', styleUrls: ['./data-binding.component.css'] }) export class DataBindingComponent { message1:string="Welcome to the Velocity"; employeeObj:any = { employeeName:"John", designation:"Angular Developer", salary:40000, skills:["Angular","HTML"] } }

data-binding works!

Employee Name {{employeeObj.employeeName}}
Designation {{employeeObj.designation}}
Salary {{employeeObj.salary | currency:'INR'}}
Skills {{employeeObj.skills[0]}},{{employeeObj.skills[1]}}

{{message1 | uppercase}}

{{message1 | lowercase}}

{{message1 | titlecase}}

Annual Salary {{annualSalary | currency}}

Annual Salary {{annualSalary | currency:'INR'}}

Today's Date: {{todaysDate}}

Todays Date with Pipe: {{todaysDate | date}}

Short Date : {{todaysDate | date:'shortDate'}}

Medium Date : {{todaysDate | date:'mediumDate'}}

Date in dd/mm/yyyy : {{todaysDate | date:'dd/MM/yyyy'}}

Total Price:{{totalPrice | number:'.1-2'}}

Total Price:{{totalPrice | number:'.1-2'}}
